#Batman v Superman wasn't good :( <VigzMv/>
def rev(m):
    ans =0
    while(m>0):
        r = m%10
        m = m/10
        ans = (ans*10) + r
    return ans
t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    temp = raw_input()
    m = temp.split(" ")
    k = int(m[0])
    n = int(m[1])
    print rev(rev(k)+rev(n))
